notifications.no_drugs_time: You can't sell drugs at this time.
notifications.buyer_rejection: Sorry, I'm not interested in what you're offering.
notifications.no_cops_on_duty: There aren't enough cops on duty.
notifications.no_drugs: I don't need what you have.
notifications.stolen_drugs: The buyer has stolen your drugs and is running away!
notifications.retrieved_drugs: You have retrieved your stolen drugs.
notifications.buyer_not_incapacitated: The buyer is not incapacitated yet.
notifications.already_bought: I've already bought from you. Come back later.
notifications.zone_cooldown: The area is too hot right now. Come back later.
notifications.personal_cooldown: You've made enough sales for now. Lay low and come back later.
notifications.destroyed_drugs: The buyer has escaped and your drugs are gone.
notifications.level_too_low: I don't know who you are!
notifications.no_drugs_to_deliver: You have no drugs to deliver.
notifications.delivery_processing: Processing your delivery request, this might take a few minutes.
notifications.delivery_ready: Your delivery is ready. Location marked on your map.
notifications.delivery_ready_start: Your delivery is ready. Start it from the dealer.
notifications.not_enough_drugs: You do not have enough drugs to complete this delivery.
notifications.delivery_cancelled: Your pending delivery has been canceled.
notifications.ped_doesnt_know_you: I don't know you, go away!
notifications.started_route: You have started your delivery route

reputation.level1_feedback1: I heard you are just starting out. Let’s see what you’ve got.
reputation.level1_feedback2: New around here? Show me what you have.
reputation.level1_feedback3: Starting fresh? Let’s see your quality.
reputation.level1_feedback4: You’re new, right? Let’s do this.
reputation.level1_deal1: I can’t offer much, but if it’s good, we can do more business.
reputation.level1_deal2: The offer is low, but prove your worth.
reputation.level1_deal3: Not much money now, but let’s build trust.
reputation.level1_deal4: Small deal now, bigger later if you’re good.
reputation.level2_description1: Hey, I’m starting to recognize you!
reputation.level2_feedback1: You’ve made a few sales. I’m starting to recognize you.
reputation.level2_feedback2: Seen you around here a few times.
reputation.level2_feedback3: Your face is getting familiar. Good sign.
reputation.level2_feedback4: Recognize you from your previous deals.
reputation.level2_deal1: I’ll offer a bit more this time. Don’t let me down.
reputation.level2_deal2: The price is better now, keep it up.
reputation.level2_deal3: Higher offer now. Prove it’s worth it.
reputation.level2_deal4: I’ll pay more this time. Don’t mess it up.
reputation.level3_feedback1: You’re getting known around here. People talk about your stuff.
reputation.level3_feedback2: Your name is spreading. That’s good.
reputation.level3_feedback3: People say good things about you.
reputation.level3_deal1: I’m willing to pay more for quality. Show me what you’ve got.
reputation.level3_deal2: I’ll pay a higher price. Keep it top quality.
reputation.level3_deal3: More money for your good reputation. Keep it up.
reputation.level3_deal4: Higher stakes, higher pay. Let’s see your best.
reputation.level4_feedback1: You’re well known in the area. Your reputation precedes you.
reputation.level4_feedback2: Everyone knows you now. Great work.
reputation.level4_feedback3: Famous in the streets. Keep it going.
reputation.level4_deal1: I’ll pay top dollar for your goods. Don’t disappoint.
reputation.level4_deal2: Top price for top quality. Let’s deal.
reputation.level4_deal3: Big money for your fame. Make it worth.
reputation.level4_deal4: High pay for high fame. Show me your best.
reputation.level5_feedback1: You’re a master dealer. Everyone knows you sell the best stuff.
reputation.level5_feedback2: Legend in the game. Everyone respects you.
reputation.level5_feedback3: Your reputation is unmatched. The best.
reputation.level5_feedback4: You’re the best there is. Everyone knows it.
reputation.level5_deal1: I’ll give you the highest price. It’s always a pleasure doing business with you.
reputation.level5_deal2: Highest price for the best dealer. Let’s do this.
reputation.level5_deal3: Top dollar for the top dealer. Always a pleasure.
reputation.level5_deal4: Maximum pay for maximum quality. Deal on.

context_menu.cancel_description: Stop the transaction with this buyer.

context_menu.stats_description2: Check your past sales and observe your progress.

milestones.title: Your Milestones
milestones.not_completed: You have not completed this milestone yet.

stats_menu.title: Your Sales History
stats_menu.drug_quantity: You've sold {quantity} units of this product.
stats_menu.return_description: Return to the deal with the buyer.
stats_menu.no_stats_description: You haven't made any sales yet. Get out there and hustle!
stats_menu.milestones_description: Check your progress and redeem rewards.

encounter.menu_description: Listen up, I need {quantity} more units of {drug}. I'm willing to pay ${totalPrice} for the lot. I'll setup a meet. You in?
encounter.meeting_set: Meeting location marked on your GPS.
encounter.meeting_success: The deal went smoothly. Nice doing business!
encounter.no_drugs: You don't have enough {drug} ({quantity} units) to complete the deal.

menu.stats_menu_description: View all the products you've moved and the quantities you've sold.
menu.stats_menu_no_stats_description: No sales records exist. Start your journey to make your mark.
menu.delivery_description: Plan your next shipment and maximize profits.
menu.start_delivery_description: Your delivery is ready. Embark on your mission.
menu.cancel_mission_description_disabled: You have no delivery mission to cancel.
menu.cancel_mission_confirm: Are you sure you want to cancel your delivery mission?
menu.delivery_description_disabled: You already have a pending delivery.
menu.start_delivery_description_disabled: You have no pending deliveries to start.
menu.reputation_description: You're known as a {rank}. Progress to next rank: {progress}%

delivery.description_small: A quick run delivering {quantity} units of {drug}. Minimal risk, fast cash.
delivery.description_medium: A steady gig delivering {quantity} units of {drug}. Balanced risk and reward.
delivery.description_large: A big haul delivering {quantity} units of {drug}. High stakes, high rewards.
delivery.drug_description: You have {amount} units ready for distribution.
delivery.route_description:
{stops} stops delivering {quantity} units each.
Earn ${payout} per stop with a {boost}% bonus!
delivery.route_description_no_boost:
{stops} stops delivering {quantity} units each.
Earn ${payout} per stop.
delivery.confirm_description: Are you sure you want to proceed with this delivery?
